dates.name: Beach Picnic at South Pointe Park
dates.description: Enjoy a scenic picnic by the ocean with stunning sunset views.

dates.name: Wynwood Walls Art Walk
dates.description: Explore the vibrant street art scene with free entry to the Wynwood Walls district.

dates.name: Kayaking at Oleta River State Park
dates.description: Paddle through beautiful mangroves and enjoy nature together.

dates.name: Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden
dates.description: A romantic stroll through lush gardens filled with exotic plants.

dates.name: Movies at Rooftop Cinema Club
dates.description: Watch classic and new movies under the stars on a rooftop theater.

dates.name: Sunset Cruise in Miami
dates.description: Take a romantic boat ride and watch the sunset over Biscayne Bay.

dates.name: Pérez Art Museum Miami
dates.description: Explore modern and contemporary art at this stunning waterfront museum.

dates.name: Vizcaya Museum and Gardens
dates.description: Step back in time with a visit to this historic Italian-style villa and gardens.

dates.name: Bike Ride on Hollywood Beach Boardwalk
dates.description: Enjoy a scenic bike ride along the beautiful Hollywood Beach Broadwalk.

dates.name: Everglades Airboat Tour
dates.description: Get up close with Florida’s wildlife on an exciting airboat ride through the Everglades.
